name: Event Shredder
short_description:
-"Shred 'Event Viewer' logs with ease."

Event Shredder is an administrative tool designed to delete 'Event Viewer' logs on windows OS.

Join the Developer team today!

Developer Batch File:
http://bit.ly/Event-Shredder-v1-bat
http://bit.ly/Event-Shredder-v2-bat

Developer Batch Script Language:
http://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Windows_Batch_Scripting

Dropbox Folder:
http://bit.ly/Dropbox-Folder

Why Open Source?
http://opensource.com/education/14/10/why-open-data-matters-education


I am changing from Batch to PowerShell 3.0
If you have Windows 7 make sure you have PowerShell 3.0 or higher.

The download for PS 3.0 can be found here:
http://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/hh847837.aspx#BKMK_InstallingOnWindows7andWindowsServer2008R2

To download PowerGUI PowerShell Editor:
http://en.community.dell.com/techcenter/powergui/m/bits/


Requirements:
• Windows 7 & higher
• Run as Administrator
